ValidationRule.description: If the Project Completion field is greater than 0, the Actual Project Start date field must be filled out.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( NOT($Profile.Name = "System Administrator"), NOT($Profile.Name = "Automated Process"), CloseDate >= DATE(2016,01,01), project_completion__c > 0, ISNULL(Actual_Project_Start_date__c))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter the "Actual project start date".
